meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being unselfish.
meanings.sent1: Her unselfishnesses always shone through in her actions.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his unselfishnesses when he donated all his winnings to charity.
meanings.sent3: His unselfishnesses were so extreme that he gave away his last piece of cake without hesitation.
meanings.sent4: The unselfishnesses of the volunteers were like a bright light in the darkness of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The unselfishnesses of the firefighter saved many lives during the fire.

meanings.definition: The act of putting others' needs before one's own.
meanings.sent1: Putting others' needs before your own shows true unselfishnesses.
meanings.sent2: Her unselfishnesses were evident when she gave up her seat for an elderly person on the bus.
meanings.sent3: The unselfishnesses of the siblings led to a hilarious argument over who should take the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: His unselfishnesses were a shield that protected him from the arrows of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The unselfishnesses of the teacher inspired her students to be kind to one another.

meanings.definition: Showing concern for the welfare of others.
meanings.sent1: Her unselfishnesses actions always made a positive impact on those around her.
meanings.sent2: The unselfishnesses doctor worked tirelessly to ensure all patients received proper care.
meanings.sent3: The unselfishnesses attitude of the dog towards the cat was both heartwarming and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His unselfishnesses nature was a beacon of light in a world filled with selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The unselfishnesses behavior of the team members led to a successful and harmonious project completion.
